AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Bruni: destination at the southern terminus of FM 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: farm-to-market road used as an indirect route to avoid checkpoints
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hebbronville: location with a checkpoint on U.S. 359 that smugglers try to avoid
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. 359: alternative route and most direct path to Bruni
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. 59: route taken by defendant as part of an indirect route to avoid checkpoints
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ranchitos Las Lomas: possible origin of journey if U.S. 359 was not immediately accessible
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2895: alternative farm-to-market road that would be a more direct route to Bruni
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. 59 to FM 2050: indirect route taken to avoid the Hebbronville checkpoint on U.S. 359
